posts.content:
For those with problems logging in could you please click this link to delete your forum cookies :

ucp.php?mode=delete_cookies

and then log in.

This should fix it.

Thanks and sorry for the inconvenience,

John

Doc, I still have problems, as such as I still have problems logging onto site evry time I visit? I have deleted all the cookies etc.
interestingly enough on the laptop I have not had to do anything and log in is no problem?

cheers Steve

Steve,
Interesting. Do you use the Laptop on the same internet connection as the PC?
Could you check what version of browser you are using on the PC and laptop? I guess you are using IE, if so select the help option in the top menu and then the "About Internet Explorer", this should show you a long version number (something like "Version: 7.0.5739.11").
Thanks,
John

laptop is wireless connection but coming from the same PC I suppose. I will take a look later, more rot to cut out now!!

cheers Steve

I am in the same position with my setup. Works fine on the laptop, not on the pc, still have to 3 click it to get in. It remembers my details but won`t auto connect. Laptop on Vista using Firefox, pc on XP pro also using Firefox. Both latest editions.

Hi Doc Im still in the same boat as last week,have to login every visit,it remembers pass word and login details but wont auto connect,yet on the lap top it still connects auto ok.lap top on same connection,both IE7 version 70573011LS.
Its also doing the same on every site i visit not just SSVC,could it be somthing i have altered on my computer. Thanks
hey doc i am having a lot of trouble logging in especially with laptop but the pc is alright and i deleted all cookies![color=#0040FF][/color]
do you knoww how to add pics cause i just joined and i mean the pics under name

wireliar wrote:
hey doc i am having a lot of trouble logging in especially with laptop but the pc is alright and i deleted all cookies![color=#0040FF][/color]

viewtopic.php?f=32&t=45218&p=365791#p365791
Things may be better now, delete cookies (press here: ucp.php?mode=delete_cookies ) and try again
John

wireliar wrote:
do you knoww how to add pics cause i just joined and i mean the pics under name


This can be done in your control panel or by clicking on this link:
ucp.php?i=profile&mode=avatar

You'll need an image hosted somewhere internet facing to be able to add the avatar image, a way of doing this is described here:
viewtopic.php?f=14&t=47329

John
don't know if makes any real differences or not, but I'm continually still having to log in each time I visit. I'm Apple Mac based but yes, I have cleared all the cookies!
how do i post adds onto forum.? thanks

showie wrote:
how do i post adds onto forum.? thanks


the same way as you posted this message, but just do it in the ‘For Sale’ section!

For adding images, get yourself a photobucket.com account, upload any images you want to use and then copy/paste the IMG Code into your ad, job done
internet connection is not the Problem that u r using Laptop and Pc with connecting same internet connection ... there might me other problem ...... try with an other Browser .. Firefox , Opera etc.
